subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ehrhardt always let the Mets know what he thought of them by raising block-lettered signs from his box seat behind third base at Shea Stadium.
snippet: Mr. Ehrhardt always let the Mets know what he thought of them by raising block-lettered signs from his box seat behind third base at Shea Stadium.
